00040   class HqlInterpreter : public ReferenceCount {
00041   public:
00043     struct Callback {
00044       FILE *output;             // default is NULL
00045       bool normal_mode;         // default true
00046       bool format_ts_in_usecs;  // default false
00047       // mutator stats
00048       uint64_t total_cells,
00049                total_keys_size,
00050                total_values_size,
00051                file_size;
00052 
00053       Callback(bool normal = true) : output(0), normal_mode(normal),
00054           format_ts_in_usecs(false), total_cells(0), total_keys_size(0),
00055           total_values_size(0), file_size(0) { }
00056       virtual ~Callback() { }
00057 
00059       virtual void on_parsed(Hql::ParserState &) { }
00060 
00064       virtual void on_return(const String &) { }
00065 
00067       virtual void on_scan(TableScanner &) { }
00068 
00070       virtual void on_update(size_t total) { }
00071 
00073       virtual void on_progress(size_t amount) { }
00074 
00078       virtual void
00079       on_finish(TableMutator *mutator = 0) {
00080         if (mutator) try {
00081           mutator->flush();
00082         }
00083         catch (Exception &e) {
00084           do {
00085             mutator->show_failed(e);
00086           } while (!mutator->retry());
00087         }
00088       }
00089     };
00090 
00092     struct SmallCallback : Callback {
00093       CellsBuilder &cells;
00094       std::vector<String> &retstrs;
00095 
00096       SmallCallback(CellsBuilder &builder, std::vector<String> &strs)
00097         : cells(builder), retstrs(strs) { }
00098 
00099       virtual void on_return(const String &ret) { retstrs.push_back(ret); }
00100       virtual void on_scan(TableScanner &scanner) { copy(scanner, cells); }
00101     };
00102 
00104     HqlInterpreter(Client *client);
00105 
00107     void execute(const String &str, Callback &);
00108 
00110     void
00111     execute(const String &str, CellsBuilder &output, std::vector<String> ret) {
00112       SmallCallback cb(output, ret);
00113       execute(str, cb);
00114     }
00115 
00116   private:
00117     Client *m_client;
00118   };
